narratives.summaryHourly: The average pay for a Lead Data Scientist is $67.15 per hour.
narratives.summarySalary: The average pay for a Lead Data Scientist is $144,121 per year.

tasks: Search for patterns in data that can provide solutions to business problems or create new business opportunities.
Communicate clearly and effectively with clients and IT teams.
Responsible for supervising team of data scientists.
Use advanced mathematical and computer science skills to analyze vast pools of data.

occupationalDetails.skills: Machine Learning, Python, Statistical Analysis, Big Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data Modeling, R, Data Analysis, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Amazon Web Services (AWS), SQL, Deep Learning, Leadership, Software Development, Project Management, Apache Spark, Econometrics, Strategic Project Management, Computer Vision
occupationalDetails.name: Lead Data Scientist
